venue.name: Market Square outside of North Church

item.description:
SUN-SHINE BUG!

Have you been bitten by the Sun-Shine bug and are itching to get outside and shoot? Wondering what to do on summer Friday night? Wishing you could spend some time getting photos to build and expand your portfolio or for an upcoming Monthly Meeting Challenge?

As always, the Seacoast Photographers Group has the answer for you.

What?
A group shoot around downtown Portsmouth, put together by Joe, John and Tim for the Southern NH Photographers Facebook group. There will be a couple dozen of your colleagues and friends, as well as several models.

Model line up!!!
We have confirmed the following models and will be adding more as registrations fill.

Maddie MM#2843121


Kaitlyn: MM#1104943

Skylar Ann MM#3038165

Brianna Fern MM#2903209

Sinead Knowlan MM#2950820

Where?

We worked out a few location areas, all within walking distance of the downtown. Including alleys, grunge areas, and riverside spots while the other includes historic buildings, parks, and waterfront areas. We'll split the group and switch halfway through, so you'll have a chance to shoot both locations.

We'll meet at Market Square - North Church at 4:00 SHARP. Don't be late or you'll have to scramble around to find us.

What to Bring?
Wear layers of weather-appropriate clothing and comfortable shoes. Bring your camera and a portrait lens. If you have a PocketWizard, any strobes, softboxes and beauty dishes. BRING THEM!

Bring snacks if you're inclined to get grumpy in the late afternoon, and a bottle of water if you like. There are only a bajillion restaurants and caf√©s in Portsmouth, so you can nosh as we go if you prefer to travel light.

If you plan on staying on toward sunset, consider bringing a tripod. We may shoot at the top of the garage (great views for free!) so you can probably leave it in the car until then.

More Info...
The cost of $25 will be distributed evenly to all models that attend to offset time and travel costs.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the large group of nerds holding all kinds of geek photo gear
item.name: Model shoot - Sunset/night time group shoot in/around downtown Portsmouth
